Row.Text: All units can move over oceans immediately. Retains 50% of the [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] benefits from a Luxury Resource if your last copy of it is traded away. 100 [ICON_GOLD] for discovering a Natural Wonder and a 400 [ICON_GOLD] bonus if first to discover it. Natural Wonders double the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]yield[ENDCOLOR] and [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] happiness. [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages last 50% longer.
